com.appsdk.advancedimageview

Class AdvancedImageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • ImageView
      • com.appsdk.advancedimageview.AdvancedImageView

  • public class AdvancedImageView
extends ImageView
    The Advanced ImageView, can auto load image from url, local image path and local movie path(mp4, wmv, avi, 3gp), use bitmap cache to ensure display speed. There's many attributes you can set to determine display mode.

      Set fix aspect ratio of image (width/height) Notice: fitHeight, fitWidth, centerCrop, aspectRatio can only set one attribute

      • setThumbnailWidth

        public void setThumbnailWidth(int thumbnailWidth)
        Whether this AdvancedImageView is thumbnail
        Parameters:
        thumbnailWidth - if > 0: AdvancedImageView show a thumbnail with thumbnailWidth if = 0: AdvancedImageView show the original image
